description: Reduce all {offense:incoming damage} by {offense:5} {+5}. Cannot be reduced below {offense:1}.

{defense:15%} {+15%} chance to {defense:block} incoming damage.

description: Your attacks have a {offense:10%} {+10%} chance to "{offense:Critically Strike}", dealing {offense:double damage}.

description:
On damage taken {offense:50%} of the damage is dealt immediately while the other {offense:50%} is delayed for {offense:3} seconds.
This effect has a cooldown of {misc:10} seconds. {Every additional item$} increases how many instances of this effect the player has.

description: Increases {defense:maximum health} by {defense:25} {+25}.
Increase damage by {offense:20%} {+20%}. Taking damage to below {debuff:25% health} {misc:breaks} this item.

Increases {defense:base health regeneration} by {defense:+3 hp/s} {+3 hp/s} while outside of combat.
Taking damage to below {debuff:25% health} {misc:consumes} this item, {defense:healing} you for {defense:75%} of {defense:maximum health}.

description:
Killing an enemy {offense:ignites} all enemies within {offense:12m} {+4m}.
Enemies {offense:burn} for {offense:150%} {+75%} base damage.
Every {offense:5} enemies slain grants a damage counter bonus increasing the player's damage by {offense:10%} {+5%|per item stack}, lasting as long as the player stays in combat.
{misc:7.5%} {+7.5%} chance on hit to knock enemies into the air. {height increases}.
When below {debuff:50% health} receive a damage increase of {offense:20%} {+20% damage bonus|per item stack}.
2 seconds after getting hurt, {defense:heal} for {defense:20} plus an additional {defense:5%} {+5%} of {defense:maximum health}.

description: After standing still for {defense:1} seconds create a zone that {defense:heals} for {defense:4.5%} {+2.25%} of your {defense:health} every second to all allies within {defense:3m} {+1.5m}.

{misc:55%} {+5%} chance on being hit to reflect {misc:10%} {+10%} damage back to the attacker.
{defense:Increase armor} by {defense:100} {+100} while out of danger.
Gain a {defense:shield} equal to {defense:8%} {+8%} of your maximum health. Recharges outside of danger.
Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

Throw a cursed doll out that {offense:triggers} any {offense:On-kill} effects you have every {misc:1} second for {misc:8} seconds.
Cooldown: {misc:45}
unlockCondition: Die 20 times.
Repair 30 drones or turrets.

description:
Instantly heal for {defense:50% of your maximum health}.
Cooldown: {misc:45s}

Gain {offense:500 armor} for {misc:5 seconds}.
Cooldown: {misc:45s}

Create a {misc:quantum tunnel} of up to {misc:1000m} in length. Lasts 30 seconds.
Cooldown: {misc:45s}
unlockCondition: Defeat the guardian of Gilded Coast without any beacons deactivating.
Collect $30,480 total gold.

description:
Spawn a gummy clone that has {offense:300% damage} and {defense:300% health}. Expires in {misc:30} seconds.
Cooldown: {misc:100s}

Revives the user when killed or dead allies on activation. Consumed on use.
Cooldown: {misc:60s}
unlockCondition: Journey to the Prime Meridian and defeat the False Son.

description:
{defense:Heal} for {defense:20%} of the {offense:damage} you deal. Lasts {defense:8} seconds.
Cooldown: {misc:60s}

Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster, dealing {offense:3000% damage} and {offense:stunning} nearby monsters.
Cooldown: {misc:20s}
unlockCondition: Defeat the Teleporter bosses after activating 2 Shrines of the Mountain.

description:
Throw {offense:6} molotov cocktails that {offense:ignites} enemies for {offense:500% base damage}. Each molotov leaves a burning area for {offense:200% damage per second}.
Cooldown: {misc:45s}

Whenever you make a gold purchase, get {misc:10%} of the spent gold back. If the purchase is a {misc:multishop} terminal, the other terminals will {misc:remaing open}.
Cooldown: {misc:0.1s}

unlockCondition: Fully upgrade a Shrine of the Woods.

description:
{misc:Transform} an Item or Equipment into a different one. {misc:Can only be converted in the same tier one time}.
Cooldown: {misc:45s}
unlockCondition: Destroy 20 flying rocks in Sky Meadow.

description:
Throw {offense:three large saw blades} that slice through enemies for {offense:3x400%} damage.
Also deals an additional {offense:3x100% damage per second} while {offense:bleeding} enemies.
Can {offense:strike} enemies again on the way back.
Cooldown: {misc:45s}

{misc:Reveal} all interactables within 500m for {misc:10 seconds}.
Cooldown: {misc:45s}
unlockCondition: Collect 10 Monster or Environment Logs.

description:
All allies enter a {offense:frenzy} for {misc:7} seconds. Increases {misc:movement speed} by {misc:50%} and {offense:attack speed} by {offense:100%}.
Cooldown: {misc:45s}

Request an {offense:Eclipse Zero Vending Machine} from the {offense:UES Safe Travels}. Delivery guaranteed in {misc:5 seconds}, dealing {offense:2000% damage}. {defense:Heal} up to 3 targets for {defense:25% of their maximum health}.
